name: Missing Characters
description:
Missing Characters is a physic-based puzzle game. You will play with the alphabetic characters to build words by creating the missing characters. All characters have different shapes. The objects can be snapped to create a group or characters. The arrow keys can also be snapped to create forces.

Complete 9 different puzzles.

Controls

  • Use the keyboard to create any character, use the Arrow Keys to add forces (Up, Down, Left, Right)
  • Press “ESC” to restart the level.
